response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled value, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to its standard market value. I trust this offer will be appealing and invite you to seize this unique opportunity. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
